attributes.action: Force by law Gypsies/travellers to clean up site on departure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everybody should clean mess he/she have done. Gypsies/Travellers should clean up and restore site they used on departure. Just one case when they left mess cost taxpayers 4000pounds to clean up. This should not happen again!
Also, if they would not clean up they should PAY huge fine for that!
